trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderItemText"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderItemText"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemTextRenderEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified text and text properties.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemTextRenderEventArgs"> </xref> classe com o texto especificado e propriedades de texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizado para desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> on which to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> no qual desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The text to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds to draw the text in.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites para desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> used to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> utilizado para desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> used to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> utilizado para desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> that specifies the vertical and horizontal alignment of the text in the bounding area.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> que especifica o alinhamento vertical e horizontal do texto na área de delimitador.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemTextRenderEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified text and text properties format.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemTextRenderEventArgs"> </xref> classe com o texto especificado e o formato de propriedades de texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizado para desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> on which to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> no qual desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The text to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds to draw the text in.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites para desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> used to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> utilizado para desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> used to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> utilizado para desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The display and layout information for text strings.
trans-unit.target: As informações de visualização e o esquema de cadeias de texto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to be drawn on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto a ser desenhado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the text to be painted on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa o texto a ser desenhado no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> text.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> texto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> text.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> texto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the text is drawn vertically or horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se o texto é desenhado verticalmente ou horizontalmente.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextDirection"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text drawn on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de letra do texto desenhado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> of the text drawn on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> do texto desenhado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display and layout information of the text drawn on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as informações de apresentação e o esquema do texto desenhada <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values that specify the display and layout information of the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> valores que especifique as informações de visualização e o esquema do texto desenhada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rectangle that represents the bounds to draw the text in.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o retângulo que representa os limites para desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds to draw the text in.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites para desenhar o texto.
